description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Resource Manager PSM service, apply the relevant updates for your Windows version:

1. Download and install the following updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your system version:
   - KB5041571 for Windows 11 Version 24H2
   - KB5041585 for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2
   - KB5041592 for Windows 11 Version 21H2
   - KB5041580 for Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2 (both x64 and 32-bit)

2. Restart your system after the installations to ensure the updates are fully integrated.

**Details**:
- The updates address the vulnerability identified by CVE-2024-38136 which could allow an attacker to elevate privileges.
- For manual installation, you can find the update packages at:
   - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
   - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
   - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
   - [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)

**Preconditions**:
- Verify the version of Windows you are using to download the correct updates.
- Backup important data before proceeding with any updates.
